issue.title: [C++] Promote util/{status.h, buffer.h, memory-pool.h} to top level of arrow/ source directory
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-419](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-419). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
These components are more fundamental to Arrow and are part of the public API. We should also take this opportunity to call `memory-pool.h` instead `memory_pool.h`
